MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair on the overhead line at Brunt Farm, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.36am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.49am on Thursday 4th February 2021 1
